title: Takkun to Stalker Danshi: Kyou wa Takkun no Tissue wo Tabemashita
original_name: たっくんとストーカー男子 ～今日はたっくんのティッシュを食べました～
sinopse:
1-3. Takkun to Stalker Danshi: Kyou wa Takkun no Tissue wo Tabemashita 4. Sorairo Canvas 5. Yasashii Itami 6. Katte, Kimama ni 7. Niji-biyori

Note: Story 1 was collected in Stalker Danshi, and story 6 was collected in Yankee Uke.
